overview: Imagine a world where money is simply no object. A life of sheer, unrivalled decadence, where nothing is impossible for the want of ready cash. Welcome to the privileged existence of the STAXUS platinum club ­ boasting members like Chris Jansen and David Sky, who can quite literally afford whoever they want, whenever they want them. It sure as fuck makes for a better class of hardcore sex, as Angel Lopez, Mike Cole and new bitch, Frank Arias, quickly discover; with an array of hard-cocked, well-heeled sluts proving their worth with a crème-de-la-crème masterclass of spunked-out finery!
title: Rich Bitch
